participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Emily loves spending time with her friends and is eager to experience life beyond her parents' home.
participant_1.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out my parents home. they are constantly on my back. i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything.
